title: Sharing Data to Solve the Autism Riddle: An Interview with Adriana Di Martino and Michael Milham of ABIDE.
text: Worldwide, at least one in 100 people has autism spectrum disorder (ASD). In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention put the number at one in 68 [1]. Despite this high rate of prevalence and the increased public awareness of autism in recent years, the underlying mechanisms of ASD still remain unclarified.
